DOC.detailed_description: This pilot study wherein eligible participant randomly assign receive either myofascial tissue manipulation global therapeutic massage . Those receive myofascial tissue manipulation target internal external connective tissue manipulation focus muscle connective tissue pelvic floor , hip girdle , abdomen . Those receive global therapeutic massage non-specific somatic treatment full-body Western massage .
